original_text: “When you sacrifice a thank offering to the Lord, sacrifice it in such a way that it will be accepted on your behalf.
korean_text: 너희가 여호와께 감사제물을 드리려거든 너희가 기쁘게 받으심이 되도록 드릴지며

sentences.original_text: When you sacrifice a thank offering to the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 주께 감사 제물을 드릴 때,

sentences.original_text: sacrifice it in such a way
that it will be accepted on your behalf.
